subject: Track and Field
Millrose Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schmertz, a Bronx native, began attending the Millrose Games at the age of 7 and succeeded his father as the meet’s director in 1975.
snippet: Mr. Schmertz, a Bronx native, began attending the Millrose Games at the age of 7 and succeeded his father as the meet’s director in 1975.
